children.name: description
children.label: Description
children.default:
Personnel connecting end-user devices to non-government-owned Wi-Fi, cellular, or wired networks must use a retransmission device (RD). 

That’s a requirement of the NSA Commercial Solutions for Classified (CSfC) Mobile Access Capability Package (MA CP). 

The MA CP draft version 2.4 requires a direct connection—not Wi-Fi—between the end-user device and RD. But providing a separate RD to personnel is problematic.
